name: iPhone 5 Cases
short_description:
The project involves creating a mobile app that will render moderated content from our site on mobile devices. It will evolve into including easy to use access to sharing sites such as Pinterest, Facebook, Twitter, etc.

Currently, the site mainly offers cases for iPhone 5 but the app should evolve to be usable for any type of content that can be merchandised.

The project will also include an easy to use front end hosted on a server that has access to make edits to what is being shown in the app.
summary: Build mobile app to view moderated content from site.
